MemberSignature.Value: public static ref T Unbox<T> (object? box) where T : struct;
.method public static hidebysig !!T Unbox<struct .ctor (class System.ValueType) T>(object box) cil managed
Public Shared Function Unbox(Of T As Structure) (box As Object) As T
static member Unbox : obj -> 'T (requires 'T : struct)
public static ref T Unbox<T> (object box) where T : struct;

span.span: The type to be unboxed.
The value to unbox.

summary.span: 将 返回到装箱值。

span.span: Returns a to a boxed value.

returns.span: 到装箱值 。

span.span: A to the boxed value .

remarks.format: `Unbox`方法只是 IL 取消[装箱](xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unbox)指令的包装器。The `Unbox` method is simply a wrapper for the IL [unbox](xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unbox) instruction. 它可作为性能优化。It is useful as a performance optimization. 每当 需要使用值类型的不同值重复调用的 API 时，可以重复使用同一个 box 对象，而不是每次创建一个新的。Whenever an API that takes an needs to be called repeatedly with different values of a value type, the same box object can be reused rather than a new one created each time. 此 `Unbox` 方法具有一个不由语言编译器强制执行的重要使用约束，这是调用方的责任。The `Unbox` method has an important usage constraint that is not enforced by language compilers and that is the responsibility of the caller. IL `unbox` 指令返回可变性托管指针。The IL `unbox` instruction returns a controlled-mutability managed pointer. 由于 .NET 和 .NET 语言编译器不能表示此约束，因此该 `Unbox` 方法返回普通可变 `ref T` 。Because .NET and .NET language compilers cannot represent this constraint, the `Unbox` method returns a normal mutable `ref T`. 不过，开发人员 **不得** 改变返回的引用，除非它们确实 `T` 是可变结构类型。However developers **must not** mutate the returned reference unless they are certain that `T` is a mutable struct type. 例如，因为数值基元（如） 不是可变结构类型，所以以下代码不支持：For example, because the numeric primitives such as are not mutable struct types, the following code is not suppported: ```csharp Unsafe.Unbox(obj) = 30; ``` 相反，类型（如） 是具有公共属性 setter 的可变结构，因此支持以下代码：In contrast, a type such as is a mutable struct with public property setters, so the following code is supported: ```csharp Unsafe.Unbox(obj).X = 50; ``` 有关详细信息，请参阅 1.8.1.2.2 ( "muttability 托管指针" ) 和 4.32 ( "取消装箱值类型"，将装箱的值类型转换为其原始格式 ") 在 [ECMA-335：公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 分区 I 到 VI](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/files/ECMA-ST/ECMA-335.pdf)。For more information, see sections III.1.8.1.2.2 ("Controlled-muttability managed pointers") and III.4.32 ("unbox -- convert boxed value type to its raw form") in [ECMA-335: Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) Partitions I to VI](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/files/ECMA-ST/ECMA-335.pdf).
